statements: SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data;
SELECT date, location, weight_kg FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE recycled = TRUE;
SELECT waste_type, weight_kg FROM waste_disposal_data ORDER BY weight_kg DESC;
SELECT location, waste_type FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE weight_kg > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY date DESC, weight_kg ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, SUM(weight_kg) AS total_weight FROM waste_disposal_data GROUP BY date HAVING total_weight > 1000 ORDER BY total_weight DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE recycled = true GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type LIKE 'Paper%' AND location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(weight_kg) AS average_weight, recycled FROM waste_disposal_data GROUP BY recycled HAVING average_weight > 500 ORDER BY recycled
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT waste_type, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_collection GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT * FROM recycling_trends WHERE recycling_rate >= 0.5 ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT trend_id, recycling_category FROM recycling_trends WHERE recycling_rate < 0.3;
SELECT date, waste_type, weight FROM waste_collection WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT waste_type, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_collection GROUP BY waste_type ORDER BY total_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND recycling_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(recycling_rate) AS average_rate, recycling_category FROM recycling_trends GROUP BY recycling_category HAVING AVG(recycling_rate) > 0.3;
SELECT id, waste_type, weight FROM waste_collection WHERE weight < 50 OR weight > 200 ORDER BY id ASC, weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection;
SELECT collection_id, collection_location, waste_type FROM waste_collection WHERE weight_kg > 100;
SELECT collection_date, SUM(weight_kg) AS total_weight FROM waste_collection GROUP BY collection_date;
SELECT center_name, accepted_materials FROM recycling_centers WHERE center_capacity >= 500;
SELECT stat_date, waste_type, total_weight_kg FROM waste_statistics ORDER BY total_weight_kg DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, collection_location FROM waste_collection WHERE waste_type = 'Recyclable';
SELECT collection_location, weight_kg FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT center_name, center_location FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT stat_date, total_weight_kg FROM waste_statistics WHERE waste_type='Organic' ORDER BY total_weight_kg DESC;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Management ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, weight FROM Waste_Management WHERE waste_type='Plastic';
SELECT * FROM Recycling_Programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT generation_type, generation_amount FROM Waste_Generation WHERE generation_date='2022-07-15';
SELECT program_id, program_name, location FROM Recycling_Programs ORDER BY program_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Management WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT location, weight FROM Waste_Management WHERE location = 'City A' AND weight > 1000;
SELECT generation_type, AVG(generation_amount) AS avg_amount FROM Waste_Generation GROUP BY generation_type;
SELECT program_name FROM Recycling_Programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Waste_Trends ORDER BY trend_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM WasteBins
SELECT location, capacity FROM WasteBins
SELECT bin_id, collection_date, collection_weight FROM WasteCollection
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM RecyclingMaterials
SELECT route_name, assigned_driver FROM CollectionRoutes
SELECT * FROM WasteBins;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM WasteBins WHERE type='plastic' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM WasteBins;
SELECT bin_id, collection_date, collection_weight, collected_by FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_weight > 100 ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM RecyclingMaterials WHERE material_category IN ('paper', 'glass') ORDER BY material_name ASC;
